channel.title: Wildy levels help please

item.title: Wildy levels help please
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

i copied a tutorial for perfect wildy levels, but i can still attack people but it sends the message as if i cant attack

i followed this tut from rune-server

http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=47073

i didnt really know where to add

client x = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
if(!CheckWildRange(x.combat)){
sendMessage(“Your level differance is too great!”);
sendMessage(“You need to move further into the Wilderness.”);
}else{
//If they are in range…
}

and btw im using zdr source. please help!

Read full topic
